name: getLineFragmentRect(_:usedRect:forParagraphSeparatorGlyphRange:atProposedOrigin:)
desc: Calculates the line fragment rectangle and line fragment used rectangle for blank lines.
declaration:
func getLineFragmentRect(_ lineFragmentRect: NSRectPointer, 
                usedRect lineFragmentUsedRect: NSRectPointer,
